MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AccountExpirationDate As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountExpirationDate { Nullable<DateTime> get(); void set(Nullable<DateTime> value); };
member this.AccountExpirationDate : Nullable<DateTime> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

value.span: A指定日期和帳戶到期的時間或 null 如果帳戶永不到期。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同所有中的屬性，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫方法傳回的物件。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object. 當您將設定，時間會預設為 UTC。When you set the , the time will default to UTC. 如果您想要撰寫以當地時間，則指定屬性的您物件做為。If you want to write in local time, then specify the property of your object as .

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccountLockoutTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountLockoutTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

span.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

value.span: A如果帳戶上設定鎖定時間不是指定日期和時間的帳戶已鎖定或 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帳戶鎖定時間系統而定，且無法設定帳戶管理 api。The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API. 若要解除鎖定帳戶，使用方法。To unlock the account, use the method. 可以可能不會鎖定帳戶時傳回非 null 值。It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the returns a non-null value. 應用程式應該使用方法，以判斷是否有此帳戶已鎖定。Applications should use the method to determine whether the account is locked out. 如同所有中的屬性，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫方法傳回的物件。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object.

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Enabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Enabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Enabled : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

value.span: 如果主體是已啟用，或如果帳戶尚未保存，則為 null否則。

span.span: if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主體尚未保存在存放區中，如果這個屬性會傳回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 保存主體之後，預設啟用的設定將取決於存放區中。After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store. 在 AD DS 與 AD LDS 存放區時停用新的主體會保存這些，而 SAM 會時它們會保存，可讓新的主體。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted. 應用程式只能設定此屬性的值之後已保存存放區中。The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

exception.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

span.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

summary.span: Expires the password for this account.

span.span: Expires the password for this account.

summary.span: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

span.span: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以強制使用者在下次登入時變更密碼。Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.

exception.span: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.

span.span: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
